import { useRef } from 'react' function RegisterSource() { const courses = [ { id: 1, name: 'Mathematics', code: 'MATH101', credits: 3, enrolled: 30, status: 'Open', }, { id: 2, name: 'Physics', code: 'PHYS101', credits: 4, enrolled: 25, status: 'Open', }, { id: 3, name: 'Chemistry', code: 'CHEM101', credits: 3, enrolled: 20, status: 'Closed', }, { id: 4, name: 'Biology', code: 'BIO101', credits: 3, enrolled: 15, status: 'Open', }, { id: 5, name: 'Computer Science', code: 'CS101', credits: 4, enrolled: 40, status: 'Closed', }, ] return (
